display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PexSL-k6hxgQ7kNvwFMa6hM&_nc_oc=AdldkvSYXN-MOsL8ruIQbAxZKD5eOJRDMK5tItxxA8JFSMyPrjtiAagcaKq5lqyf9Kk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qwNju3uXfSSZWiX4E9zEVQ&oh=00_AfEpy2nMKM0oGZueVDvfZLGRT5xWY1LeUSmdJ9gDmng4yw&oe=68079F1D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=p8uXidqRPfgQ7kNvwGaJmcC&_nc_oc=AdmQE-Z3u9Rax2n80H51AgH02CQkNHBSvXvYARaAz7iiDca_G4y7KFjygS-Xo6Rw9EQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qwNju3uXfSSZWiX4E9zEVQ&oh=00_AfEdzSuhL4bI_8pqNKnS0DM8R-U7srnakIOyHRDHmn-HLg&oe=6807B912)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=N0lmYoD4lFMQ7kNvwG-Euaf&_nc_oc=AdlIvBab4W7BKWX2QWAY6y_VlTStlDW85J_YeUxV6n4vwrrnV1Pm414nUvZMcuH1iYY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qwNju3uXfSSZWiX4E9zEVQ&oh=00_AfF81VT4QspINdMODyukOwmRqzkXOcoUdg6lxl7dWuleCw&oe=6807BF23)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=o0MXJ66EZ54Q7kNvwEwLgDS&_nc_oc=AdlYezCgMi4YDE57wjCzFVPuZa66JjgmSDaxKehJjtFsonLvKVfBMO4Cl8xiDREK3AI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qwNju3uXfSSZWiX4E9zEVQ&oh=00_AfF07L8jH8e1EkT4SGRRZ8LSRqKFYI6Rt1s2wIm2Uhl2Tg&oe=6807B5AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=3CveaKrGQOUQ7kNvwEtGAHt&_nc_oc=AdkXdp47h4daJWHwFm8jkrS9FUN_6B8EH4n0szYaDyhR2jsfdsaO3GzQveW6-2ZhYfA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qwNju3uXfSSZWiX4E9zEVQ&oh=00_AfEhpoo2jmNOePLA-iynaJEOkaTOqLc57D55UsMLngO9fg&oe=6807BD96)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
